pages.text: $(thing)The Grove Journal$() contains all the knowledge a budding botanist and mage needs to begin their journey into the mystical arts of natural magic.$(br2)This journal is organized into various sections to help you navigate the many aspects of magical practice.

$(bold)Main Categories:$()$(li)$(thing)Introduction$() - Basic concepts and getting started$(li)$(thing)Magical Flora$() - Information about magical plants and their properties$(li)$(thing)Magical Tools$() - Tools and implements for the practicing mage$(li)$(thing)World Events$() - Rare magical phenomena and their effects$(li)$(thing)Spell Crafting$() - The art of creating and casting spells

As you progress in your studies, you may discover additional knowledge that will be automatically added to this journal.$(br2)$(italic)Remember that true understanding comes not just from reading, but from practical application. Experiment with what you learn here, and you may discover secrets not recorded in these pages.$()
